parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
To drink, imbibe. A prolonged form of pio, which poo occurs only as an alternate in certain tenses; to imbibe.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: To mix, mingle. A primary verb; to mix.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.
Gall, bitter herbs. Feminine of an equivalent perhaps akin to the same as Chloe; 'gall' or bile, i.e. poison or an anodyne.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I taste, (b) I experience. A primary verb; to taste; by implication, to eat; figuratively, to experience.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.
To drink, imbibe. A prolonged form of pio, which poo occurs only as an alternate in certain tenses; to imbibe.
